title: October 4, 2019: Pundi X (NPXS): Down 2.81%; Surprising Moves In Transfers Added
text:
Pundi X Price Update

Pundi X is down by approximately 2.81% from the previous day, with its price currently hovering around $0.0002315 USD. Pundi X enters the day 23.29% below its 20 day moving average, and is experiencing its the 5th day in a row down. In terms of an expected trading range, the Bollinger bands on Pundi X suggest price may bounce between $0.000213 and $0.000391 based on its momentum and volatility over the past 14 days. As we are closer to the bottom of that range, rangebound traders may wish to consider exploring buying opportunities.

Trade Pundi x (NPXS) and over 500 other cryptos across ten different exchanges — all from one app. Try Quadency.

The market capitalization of Pundi X, or the amount of US dollars it would take to buy up all the circulating coins, is currently estimated to be $56 million.

Unusual Developments

Yesterday, the metrics transfers added saw a daily change well outside what is usually experienced. An exploration as to what caused this may be worthwhile.

Straight Off the Chain

Yesterday saw 5,282 transfers amongst holders of Pundi X. In terms of estimating the number of holders, over the past day the total number of wallets holding Pundi X has gone up by approximately 402. Our engagement rank, which combines weekly percentage growth in number of holders and number of transfers, has Pundi X ranked 6 out of the 32 Ethereum tokens we’re tracking.

How are the Strong Holders of Pundi X Faring?

In terms of wealth concentration, the richest 1,000 wallets own 88.17% of the coin’s total money supply. Drilling down to just exchanges, the top 1,000 wallets that are exchanges control 12.14% of the currency’s money supply. In terms of growth rates, the share of total supply of the richest 1,000 wallets has grown by -0.16% over the past week. For the exchange wallets within the richest 1,000 wallets, their share has grown by 3.63%. Pundi X’s smart contract owns approximately 0.02% of its own total money supply. This amount hasn’t changed over the past week.

How Active are the Software Developers?

The last activity date on Pundi X’s GitHub repository was September 27, 2019, or about 7 days ago. Over the past 30 days, we’ve seen open issues across Pundi X’s GitHub repositories grow by 0 per day on average, while the number of watchers has grown by 0.03.

The Latest on Pundi X and Social Media

Social media growth, in terms of Twitter followers and Reddit subscribers, came in at up 86 and 3 over the past day for Pundi X. Traders interested in following Pundi X has the biggest presence on Twitter, where it has 66,402 users engaged. Here is the Twitter page for Pundi X.

Where to Buy

You can trade Pundi x, listed under the symbol NPXS, through the following exchanges: Gate, Yobit, Binance, DDEX.

Article by SixJupiter
